originalText.text:
Our company was looking for a phone system geared toward being mobile as we operate throughout the greater Northeast from several locations. The Steadfast team made our upgrade seamless and provides fantastic support and service. Highly recommended.
Plant-Automation-Group

text.text:

Plant-Automation-Group

originalText.text:
Five star experience for a very competitive price!

Initially, I was trying to figure out how to best set up my home office due to COVID. After shopping around a bit and doing some research to bring myself up to speed with respect to VOIP services, I decided to go with Steadfast. The company doesn't seem to be as large as some of their competitors and there were not a lot of online reviews for me to read. But my sales rep made me feel so comfortable throughout the entire process that I knew I was in the right place. My priorities were WIFI and Bluetooth.

I will also add this information for those who are new to this like me. I went with a WIFI capable phone because my home office is not located close enough for me to plug it into my home router downstairs (and I'm certain there are many people like me). Only when you when you go the WIFI route is when you will need a power cord. Because, if I'm not mistaken, the ethernet cord would serve as the power if you go the hard wire route. If you go WIFI, be prepared to purchase the power cord separately.

My sales rep also highly suggested I go with the top notch Cisco model 8861. He explained to me that it is slightly more expensive, but it will save me countless hours of having to do manual updates. I was reluctant to spend anymore than originally planned. But now I am so glad that I did. I can see the phone automatically updating software at times when it is no longer in use. What a huge time saver that proved to be already.

Lastly, I really appreciate how anytime I have had any questions or technical issues, my same sales rep is still always available to me. The phone service itself has been great so far as well. The call quality is phenomenal and my clients can hear me just fine. I literally have zero complaints.

#LongLiveSTEADFAST
